title: Chapter 1526 - Proving His Dao And Entering Manifesting Void
body:
Chapter 1526 - Proving His Dao And Entering Manifesting Void

Stinging tribulation light fell, silent and without a trace.

Yet the aura permeating it was calamitous and terrifying beyond limit!

The man in the changshan freaked out, his handsome face full of horror and confusion.

What horrified him was the tribulation’s calamitous aura; it alone was enough to fill his heart with indescribable despair.

What confused him was that Su Yi had chosen to undergo tribulation in such a grievously wounded state. Why was he so confident that he could overcome it?

A moment later, he reached a conclusion. The Reincarnator isn’t planning to survive this. He wants to borrow the tribulation’s power to take me to the grave with him!

The man in the changshan didn’t hesitate. He immediately turned to flee.

But he was one step too late. The light of the tribulation was too quick, and too destructive. There was no escape.

Within seconds, the man in the changshan was annihilated completely, swatted like a fly, severed like a blade of grass!

Although the man in the changshan couldn’t see it, when the tribulation light slammed into Su Yi, the mysterious outline of a sword shattered it.

A rain of light enveloped Su Yi’s tall, upright figure completely.

Surging vitality coursed into his body. His muscles, bones, skins, meridians, blood, and organs all underwent a startling transforma...
original_title: Chapter 1526 - Proving His Dao and Entering Manifesting Void
